subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Paul Valthaty of Punjab is a cricketing foot soldier, a low-priced backup to the expensive international talent. Two astounding performances in the span of four days have rocketed him from obscurity to fame.
snippet: Paul Valthaty of Punjab is a cricketing foot soldier, a low-priced backup to the expensive international talent. Two astounding performances in the span of four days have rocketed him from obscurity to fame.
